job_details.Vacaturetitel: Patient monitoring R&D Engineer / Project manager
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
You are responsible for design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions, which are deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings. Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies for 20-40% of time., * Design and develop (AI/ML-based) algorithms which touch more than 600 000 patients annually.
     * Abreast with latest developments in Data and AI Innovation in the field of vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction
     * Lead projects and manage programs to develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions using lates technologies such as generative AI
     * Join the winning team of Hospital Patient Monitoring, in particular the Data & AI R&D team who works together with other R&D teams, program management, clinical and marketing teams of Hospital Patient Monitoring business
     * Learn how to develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions which make a real difference in healthcare - improve outcomes and reduce costs.
     * Grow as an engineer, scientist, project / program manager or a leader, selecting between enormous opportunities Philips offers to grow your career. We offer a flexible work schedule, hybrid way of working, and access to local well-being focused activities.
job_details.full_text:
Patient monitoring R&D Engineer / Project manager

You are responsible for design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions, which are deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings. Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies for 20-40% of time., * Design and develop (AI/ML-based) algorithms which touch more than 600 000 patients annually.
     * Abreast with latest developments in Data and AI Innovation in the field of vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction
     * Lead projects and manage programs to develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions using lates technologies such as generative AI
     * Join the winning team of Hospital Patient Monitoring, in particular the Data & AI R&D team who works together with other R&D teams, program management, clinical and marketing teams of Hospital Patient Monitoring business
     * Learn how to develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions which make a real difference in healthcare - improve outcomes and reduce costs.
     * Grow as an engineer, scientist, project / program manager or a leader, selecting between enormous opportunities Philips offers to grow your career. We offer a flexible work schedule, hybrid way of working, and access to local well-being focused activities.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on designing and developing ML/AI-based algorithms for patient monitoring, emphasizing predictive modeling for risk prediction and vital signs analysis. While generative AI is mentioned, the core application appears to be in traditional predictive modeling for healthcare outcomes, aligning more closely with an ML Engineer's focus on data-driven predictive models.

job_tasks.phrase: design and development of acute patient measurement/management algorithms including ML/AI-based solutions
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and development of algorithms, which is the core of the Modeling task, specifically mentioning ML/AI-based solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and develop (AI/ML-based) algorithms which touch more than 600 000 patients annually.
job_tasks.justification: This reiterates the focus on designing and developing AI/ML algorithms, a key component of the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: vital signs analysis and biomarkers for risk prediction
job_tasks.justification: This describes the application of modeling techniques for prediction and analysis of health-related data, fitting the Modeling category.

job_tasks.phrase: develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions using lates technologies such as generative AI
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions developing AI-based solutions and includes generative AI, which falls under the broader Modeling category, especially when applied to specific tasks like patient monitoring.

job_tasks.phrase: deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the context and application domain of the algorithms, indicating an understanding of where the technical solutions will be used within the healthcare business.
This highlights the business impact and goals of the developed solutions, aligning with understanding business objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: develop reliable and safe medical-grade solutions
job_tasks.justification: This implies the need to build robust and safe software solutions that meet specific industry standards (medical-grade), which is part of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: deployed in intensive care, general ward, or other care settings.
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'deployed' suggests involvement in the operational aspects of getting the models into production environments.

job_tasks.phrase: Project management responsibility preferably thought the scale agile methodologies for 20-40% of time.
job_tasks.justification: While primarily project management, agile methodologies and managing the development lifecycle can overlap with MLOps principles for deployment and iteration.

job_tasks.phrase: Lead projects and manage programs to develop of (AI-based) patient measurement and monitoring solutions
job_tasks.justification: Leading projects and managing programs for developing solutions implies overseeing the entire lifecycle, including deployment and maintenance, which relates to MLOps.

technologies.name: generative AI
technologies.context: used for developing patient measurement and monitoring solutions
